title: Deceived
description: Fashion designer Janelle Avery was attracted to sexy hotel owner Aidan Clark from the moment they met. But since she’s dating one of Aidan’s employees, she has no intention of acting on that attraction.Aidan Clark wants Janelle Avery. She’s dating a jerk, and she should belong to him. He has too much honor to try to steal another man’s woman. But when he finds out that Janelle and Jerome have an open relationship, her can’t resist the chance to make her his, even if it is for only one night.
author: Thayer King
